name: The Plague Bearer of Garr
description:
The Plague Bearer of Garr is an add-on for The Sundered Land by lumpley games.

The Sundered Land is an RPG of mini games, each telling a short vignette in a shared world. This game continues that trend, putting you in the shoes of travelers, facing deprivation as they head to the Ruined City of Garr.

This can be played stand-alone for a short jaunt, or may be slotted it with other Sundered Land games
